p: Leaves and rhizomes of P. hybridus subsp. ochroleucus were collected in September 2014 from natural habitats, close to the village of Petačinci (42°52′50 N; 22°40′19.17 E), Dimitrovgrad, southeastern Serbia. Voucher specimens were deposited in the “Herbarium Moesiacum Niš” (HMN) of the Department of Biology and Ecology, Faculty of Science and Mathematics, University of Niš under the acquisition number 10,800. The official name of the species and status has been checked with http://www.theplantlist.org on 20 October 2017.
